title: The Most Intriguing Teams at the Deadline, Plus All-Star Reserves Debates | Group Chat
description:
Verrier, Rob, and Wos start by discussing a handful of teams that could be looking to make trades before the deadline (1:34). Then they debate who the All-Star reserves should be for each conference (48:03).

Hosts: Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, Wosny Lambre
Production Assistant: Isaiah Blakely
